summary: Documentary film produced for the 10th anniversary release of the film La lista de Schindler (1993) and the establishment of the "Survivors of the Shoah Visual History Foundation"
cast: Steven Spielberg|Leon Leyson|Leopold Rosner|Ludmila Page|Leopold Pfefferberg|Lena Finder|Helena Jonas-Rosenzweig|Basia Toporski|Celina Biniaz|Ida Turner|Lewis Fagen|Samuel Wertheim|Jetti Rosenzweig|Winston Churchill
title: Voices from the List
